"use client" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { Minus, Plus, ShoppingBag, Trash2 } from "lucide-react" import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext" export default function CartPage() { const { cartItems, updateQuantity, removeFromCart, getCartTotal } = useCart() const subtotal = getCartTotal() const shipping = subtotal > 0 ? 50 : 0 const total = subtotal + shipping return (

Your Cart

{cartItems.length > 0 ? (
{/* Cart Items */}

Cart Items ({cartItems.length})

{/* Cart Item List */}
{cartItems.map((item) => (
{/* Product Image */}
{/* Product Details */}
{item.product.name}

{item.product.category === "cup" ? `${item.product.waxType} Wax, ${item.product.weight}g` : `Shaped Candle - ${item.product.shape}`}

EGP {item.product.price}

{/* Quantity Controls */}
{item.quantity}
{/* Item Total & Remove */}
EGP {(item.product.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

Subtotal EGP {subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping EGP {shipping.toFixed(2)}
Total EGP {total.toFixed(2)}
Continue Shopping
) : (

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added any candles to your cart yet.

Start Shopping
)}
) }
